items.content_html: A lightweight and modern paste bin and url shortener.

items.content_html: ArmCord is a custom client designed to enhance your Discord experience while keeping everything lightweight.
items.title: ArmCord/ArmCord: ArmCord is a custom client designed to enhance your Discord experience while keeping everything lightweight.

items.content_html: A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!
items.title: ChristianE00/AudioKit:  A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!

items.content_html: 面相浏览器端免费开源的三维可视化编辑器，包含BIM轻量化，CAD解析预览等特色功能。 A free and open source 3D visualization editor for browsers, including BIM lightweight, CAD parsing preview and other features.

items.content_html: NarraLeaf-React is a lightweight front-end visual novel player. NL focuses on visual novel playing, so the user interface can be customized very easily.
items.title: helloyork/narraleaf-react: NarraLeaf-React is a lightweight front-end visual novel player. NL focuses on visual novel playing, so the user interface can be customized very easily.

items.content_html: GlinUI is an open-source, lightweight, and modular UI component library for React, built with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. It offers a collection of customizable and performance-optimized components to help developers build modern, responsive web applications with ease.
items.title: GLINCKER/glinui: GlinUI is an open-source, lightweight, and modular UI component library for React, built with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. It offers a collection of customizable and performance-optimized components to help developers build modern, responsive web applications with ease.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: ⚡ A lightweight, flexible, and customizable bottom sheet package for React Native.
items.title: ahmetaltai/react-native-bottom-sheet: ⚡ A lightweight, flexible, and customizable bottom sheet package for React Native.

items.content_html: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.
items.title: react18-tools/nextjs-darkmode: A lightweight library for managing dark mode, accommodating both user preferences and the system preference.

items.content_html: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.
items.title: react18-tools/react-markdown-autolink: A highly lightweight utility that automatically detects and makes links clickable in Markdown rendered by react-markdown.

items.content_html: Super lightweight typescript function to convert hexes of format #RRGGBB to rgb of value rgb(x,y,z) or rgba(x,y,z,a).
items.title: flofehrenbacher/hex-2-rgb: Super lightweight typescript function to convert hexes of format #RRGGBB to rgb of value rgb(x,y,z) or rgba(x,y,z,a).
